snippet: To the Editor:    Your June 27 news article on the plight of the California State Bar overlooks a chief reason given by Gov. Pete Wilson for vetoing the bar's financing bill, a reason -- and a veto -- endorsed by most California lawyers, whatever ...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Your June 27 news article on the plight of the California State Bar overlooks a chief reason given by Gov. Pete Wilson for vetoing the bar's financing bill, a reason -- and a veto -- endorsed by most California lawyers, whatever their politics.
abstract: Letter by Stephen R Barnett, professor of law at University of California at Berkeley, supports Gov Pete Wilson for vetoing California State Bar's financing bill (Jun 27 article)
